channel.title: Line on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Line on Memo Tut

item.title: [Automation] Detect changes in website and notify LINE
item.description: #Introduction I am a high school student. Due to the influence of this corona, I could not go to school, and I was told to regularly visit the website prepared by the school and study at home according to the instructions written on that site, but the website is heavy and every day Checking for updates is a hassle. But I want to get the information as soon as possible.

item.title: LINE notification from real-time video recognition with DeepStream SDK
item.description: #LINE notification from high-speed video recognition with DeepStream SDK This article is the 7th day of Docomo Advent Calendar 2019. My name is Sakai from NTT Docomo Service Innovation Department. In my work, I am working on the research and development of image recognition engines that use Deep Learning and their commercialization. This time, we used the GPU-based video recognition acceleration tool “DeepStream SDK” to detect cars from the video at high speed and notify the result to LINE.

item.title: [LINE Messaging API] Create a rich menu in Python
item.description: #リッチメニューの作成手順 def createRichmenu(): result = False try: # define a new richmenu rich_menu_to_create = RichMenu( size = RichMenuSize(width=1200, height=405), selected = True, name = 'richmenu for randomchat', chat_bar_text = 'TAP HERE', areas=[ RichMenuArea( bounds=RichMenuBounds(x=0, y=0, width=480, height=405), action=MessageAction(text=config.REMOVE) ), RichMenuArea( bounds=RichMenuBounds(x=480, y=0, width=720, height=405), action=MessageAction(text=config.NEXT) ) ] ) richMenuId = line_bot_api.create_rich_menu(rich_menu=rich_menu_to_create) # upload an image for rich menu path = 'image path for richmenu' with open(path, 'rb') as f: line_bot_api.

item.title: A simple system that automatically shoots and sends LINE by detecting objects
item.description: #Introduction Automatically shoot when an object crosses it! Introducing a system that sends images to LINE. **Are your cats eating food properly during a one-night, two-day excursion? I was worried if I was drinking water so I made it. ** It will be a simple system using Raspai, It is recommended that you can check the camera image on LINE while you are out, such as people who have pets.
